seo_content:
Exclusive FTMO Trading Offer

FTMO, based in the Czech Republic and established January 2015, is a CFD prop trading firm offering 2 Steps and 1 Step programs. It provides account sizes from $10,000 to $200,000 and supports MT5, cTrader, DXTrade and MT4. Recently acquired OANDA to expand into regulated brokerage. authenticated by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: FTMO Promo Code: €101 OFF Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with FTMO using our exclusive discount code. checked for the current trading season.
